name: Vanilla Gelato
description: Classic Italian vanilla gelato made with real Madagascar vanilla beans.
serverNotes: House-made vanilla gelato with real vanilla beans. Creamy, smooth, classic. Pairs beautifully with dessert wines, espresso, or enjoy on its own. Perfect base for affogato.

name: Chocolate Gelato
description: Rich dark chocolate gelato with intense cocoa flavor.
serverNotes: Decadent chocolate gelato made with premium cocoa. Rich, intense, satisfying. Note: Contains peanuts. Pairs wonderfully with Port, coffee cocktails, or espresso.

name: Strawberry Gelato
description: Fresh strawberry gelato made with real fruit.
serverNotes: Fresh strawberry gelato with real fruit. Bright, fruity, refreshing. Pairs beautifully with Prosecco, Moscato, or sweet sparkling wines.

name: Peach Gelato
description: Sweet peach gelato with fresh summer fruit.
serverNotes: Seasonal peach gelato made with ripe fruit. Sweet, aromatic, summery. Pairs wonderfully with Moscato d'Asti, dessert wines, or iced tea.

name: Pistachio Gelato
description: Traditional Sicilian pistachio gelato with real nuts.
serverNotes: Authentic Sicilian pistachio gelato with real nuts. Nutty, creamy, elegant. Note: Contains peanuts and tree nuts. Pairs with dessert wines, Marsala, or espresso.

name: Blackberry Gelato
description: Dark and fruity blackberry gelato with real berries.
serverNotes: Vibrant blackberry gelato with real berries. Rich, fruity, bold. Pairs beautifully with Port, dessert wines, or Prosecco.

name: Coconut Gelato
description: Tropical coconut gelato with real coconut.
serverNotes: Tropical coconut gelato with real coconut. Creamy, exotic, refreshing. Pairs with rum cocktails, tropical drinks, or Moscato.

name: Salted Caramel Gelato
description: Sweet and salty caramel gelato with sea salt.
serverNotes: Indulgent salted caramel gelato. Sweet with hint of sea salt. Rich, balanced, irresistible. Pairs with bourbon, cognac, or coffee cocktails.

name: Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip Gelato
description: Creamy peanut butter gelato studded with chocolate chips.
serverNotes: Decadent peanut butter gelato with chocolate chips. Rich, nutty, satisfying. Contains peanuts and tree nuts. Pairs with Port, stout beers, or coffee cocktails.

name: Blood Orange Sorbetto
serverNotes: Vibrant blood orange sorbetto - dairy-free, refreshing. Bright citrus flavor, beautiful color. Perfect palate cleanser. Pairs with Prosecco, Aperol Spritz, or enjoy alone.

name: Limoncello Sorbetto
description: Italian lemon sorbetto with a hint of limoncello liqueur.
serverNotes: Classic Italian limoncello sorbetto - dairy-free with bright lemon and hint of liqueur. Refreshing, tangy, perfect digestif. Traditional Italian palate cleanser. Pairs with Prosecco or espresso.
